description: The T-shirt in the “La Liste” special edition design features two special prints evoking the extreme situations experienced by Jérémie Heitz on expeditions for his new film. It is made from environmentally friendly and socially sustainable bioRe® organic cotton. A comfortable T-shirt for freeriding or leisure wear with a distinctive look. The film “La Liste – Everything or Nothing” documents the project conceived by Mammut Pro Team Athlete Jérémie Heitz, in which he skis the most spectacular 6,000 meter peaks in an unprecedented new style. This sequel to the sensational first film has once again been produced in partnership with Mammut.
name: Mammut La Liste T-Shirt - Mens
